package.name: PDO_MYSQL
package.description: This extension provides a MySQL driver for PDO.

release.notes:
** Changes ** - Improved error detection for OPTIMIZE queries - Added PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_LOCAL_INFILE, PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_INIT_COMMAND, PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_READ_DEFAULT_FILE, PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_READ_DEFAULT_GROUP - Improved error reporting when using native prepared statements - Fixed PECL Bug #5193: improved bounds checking when calling getColumnMeta() - Fixed Bug #34630: improved (emulated) LOB support - Fixed Bug #34623: crash when selecting longtext fields - Fixed PECL Bug #5802; is_null flag was sticking - Fixed PECL Bug #5645; added mysql client library version information to phpinfo() output.
Windows binaries can be found at http://pecl4win.php.net/ext.php/php_pdo_mysql.dll
